alert.note: Alert for Northern Cayuga; Oswego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 18 at 9:27PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF OSWEGO AND NORTHERN CAYUGA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a half of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 924 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was located between Parish and Fulton in Oswego county, extending west into northern Cayuga county. This band of snow will drift to the south and weaken through midnight. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Oswego, Fulton, Fair Haven Beach State Park, Central Square, Battle Island State Park, Hastings, Volney, West Monroe, Palermo, Sterling, Minetto, Williamstown, Hannibal, Parish, South Hannibal, Amboy Center, Pennellville, Mallory, Gayville, and Furniss. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 32 and 33. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
